title: How to Access Archive Photos on iOS Devices

steps.title: Open Photos.
steps.content: Open Photos. This app icon looks like a multicolored flower. You can find this app on your home screen or by searching. You can hide photos in Apple's Photos so they can't be seen anymore, then unhide them later. Only you can see these photos.

steps.title: Tap Albums.
steps.content: Tap Albums . You'll see this in the bottom right corner of your screen.

steps.title: Tap Hidden.
steps.content: Tap Hidden . You'll see this listed under "Other Albums."

steps.title: Tap a photo to view it.
steps.content: Tap a photo to view it. If you want to unarchive the photo, tap the share icon and Unhide . [1] X Research source
